Package com.deco2800.game.entities.components

Interface Interactable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdviceActions, BananaPeelActions, BedActions, BookActions, CatActions, DoorActions, DrinkActions, ForeignBedActions, GenericChore, GenericHighlight, GenericToggleHighlight, HorizontalDoorActions, InteractionComponent, InteractionControllerComponent, MumActions, PlaceableBoxActions, PlantActions, PuddleActions, ShrubActions, TrashActions, TvActions, VerticalDoorActions, WashingDishesActions
public interface Interactable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void onCollisionEnd​(Entity target)
    Called when a valid collision end is detected from one of the parent entity's fixtures and one of the target entity's fixtures
    void onCollisionStart​(Entity target)
    Called when a valid collision start is detected from one of the parent entity's fixtures and one of the target entity's fixtures
    void onInteraction​(Entity target)
    Called when an interaction should happen between the parent entity and the target entity
    void onPreCollisionEnd​(Fixture me, Fixture other)
    Responsible for cleaner onCollisionEnd method signature and dependencies
    void onPreCollisionStart​(Fixture me, Fixture other)
    Responsible for cleaner onCollisionStart method signature and dependencies
    Entity preCollisionCheck​(Fixture me, Fixture other)
    Performs a check on whether the collision is valid for parsing.
    void toggleHighlight​(boolean shouldHighlight)
    Called when the object is requested to toggle its highlight.

  • Method Details

    • preCollisionCheck

      Entity preCollisionCheck​(Fixture me, Fixture other)
      Performs a check on whether the collision is valid for parsing.
      Parameters:
      me - should be owned by parent entity
      other - owned by target entity
      Returns:
      target entity if valid, otherwise null

    • onPreCollisionStart

      void onPreCollisionStart​(Fixture me, Fixture other)
      Responsible for cleaner onCollisionStart method signature and dependencies
      Parameters:
      me - should be owned by parent entity
      other - owned by target entity

    • onPreCollisionEnd

      void onPreCollisionEnd​(Fixture me, Fixture other)
      Responsible for cleaner onCollisionEnd method signature and dependencies
      Parameters:
      me - should be owned by parent entity
      other - owned by target entity

    • onCollisionStart

      void onCollisionStart​(Entity target)
      Called when a valid collision start is detected from one of the parent entity's fixtures and one of the target entity's fixtures
      Parameters:
      target - entity that has started colliding with the parent entity

    • onCollisionEnd

      void onCollisionEnd​(Entity target)
      Called when a valid collision end is detected from one of the parent entity's fixtures and one of the target entity's fixtures
      Parameters:
      target - entity that has ended colliding with the parent entity

    • onInteraction

      void onInteraction​(Entity target)
      Called when an interaction should happen between the parent entity and the target entity
      Parameters:
      target - entity that has requested interaction with the parent entity

    • toggleHighlight

      void toggleHighlight​(boolean shouldHighlight)
      Called when the object is requested to toggle its highlight. May be extended for multiplayer by checking that the list of colliding player entities is empty.
      Parameters:
      shouldHighlight - whether the render component should change to a highlighted variation or not
